mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_account, member_password, member_name, member_gender, member_age, member_height, member_weight, member_phone) VALUES (#{memberAccount}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberGender}, #{memberAge}, #{memberHeight}, #{memberWeight}, #{memberPhone})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_account = #{memberAccount}, member_password = #{memberPassword}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_gender = #{memberGender}, member_age = #{memberAge}, member_height = #{memberHeight}, member_weight = #{memberWeight}, member_phone = #{memberPhone} WHERE member_account = #{memberAccount}
